pr_title: [ls] copy build listener list before notification

timeline.bodyText: should we use a safe datastructure as ListenerList or CopyOnWriteArraySet as we do it at other places? what do you think @szarnekow ?
timeline.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText: Yes, I think a CopyOnWriteArrayList (preserving semantics) or CopyOnWriteArraySet would be better to avoid unnecessary copying and also be save wrt adding listeners from read commands.
replies.author: szarnekow
